Stop-loss strategy: [Sell if price falls below 90% of current price]
[Close below 10.2, or if ROE/ROA/OPM/Gross profit margin falls below previous year's value by more than 20%]
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% or when the ROE and ROA indicators show consecutive negative growth.
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% or more from the current price, or when the ROE and ROA indicators show a significant decline.
